title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - LinkedIn Ads Setup (veribits.com)
description:
Set up and launch LinkedIn paid advertising campaign for veribits.com targeting Security and Compliance professionals.

## Budget
- Total: $200
- Daily: $15/day
- Duration: 13 days

## Ad Creative
- **Headline**: "Trust Is a Vulnerability. Verify Everything."
- **Body**: Automated verification for vendors, identities, and transactions. Reduce fraud, pass audits, sleep better.

## Targeting
- Job Titles: Security Analyst, Compliance Officer, Risk Manager, Fraud Analyst, GRC Manager
- Industries: Financial Services, Healthcare, Technology/SaaS
- Company Size: 100-5000 employees

## Success Metrics
- Target CAC: < $6.67
- Target signups: 30+
- Target CTR: > 0.3%
testing_plan:
1. Day 3 review: CTR and initial engagement
2. Week 1 review: Calculate CAC
3. Adjust messaging if CTR < 0.2%
rollback_plan: Pause campaign if CAC exceeds $15 after 7 days
